content: p1 k4 x 4 k3 continue with cable 2 pick up one stitch in corner then pick up and knit 10 12 stitches from side of heel flap facing transfer the 11 13 stitches to spare i used the cable needle needle and then to hanging end of other cable knit to bor marker decreasing for ankle corner hole knit to last two stitches on cable 1 k2tog work across cable 2 top of foot stitches in pattern as above cable 1 k2tog knit to bor marker work 1 round even no decreasing remembering to pattern top of foot as above decreasing sides entwined house socks for ladies page 3 round 1 knit to 3 stitches before end of cable 1 k2tog k1 work cable 2 in pattern switch to cable 1 k1 ssk knit to bor marker round 2 work even no decreasing count 16 18 stitches from bor to end of each side of cable 1 and 26 27 stitches on top of foot cable 2 repeat round 1 and 2 until there are 26 27 stitches for top of foot and 9 11 stitches from bor to end of each side of cable 1 total 44 49 stitches continue working even knit every round working top of foot in pattern until foot gusset tube of foot measures 2 inches shorter than your foot from back of heel to end of big toe knit one round even no patterning on top of foot decreasing in center of top of foot by k2tog once for m/l only 44 48 stitches working toe redistribute stitches so there are 22 24 on each cable knitting to bor round 1 knit to 3 stitches before end of cable k2tog k1 cable 2 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches before end of cable k2tog k1 cable 1 k1 ssk knit to bor round 2 knit around even with no decreasing repeat round 1 and 2 until there are 14 16 sts on each cable then repeat round 1 only until there are 6 8 stitches on each cable knit to past the bor to equalize the cable stitches and ending out at the end of one cable kitchener graft toe as in tutorial link make right sock working all cables as c4r picking up stitches for ankle using dpn s needle 1 k across heel cup stitches pick up and knit 10 12 stitches from flap side facing pick up and knit one stitch in the corner dig down a bit to prevent a hole don t just use the first bar needle 2 work across top of foot stitches in k4 p1 ribbing as established each end of needle will have p1 for size s and k3 for size m/l--26 27 st on needle needle 3 pick up and knit one stitch in corner and 10 12 stitches from flap side facing and knit across 6 7 st on the heel cup pm for center bottom of foot size s 17 26
